InvoiceProcessedDetailEvent.name: InvoiceProcessedDetailEvent
InvoiceProcessedDetailEvent.description: Represents the notification to customers regarding the results of an attempt to create an invoice from billing schedules as part of /commerce/billing/invoices request. The InvoiceProcessedDetailEvent platform event contains the results of an attempt to create an invoice from one or more billing schedules that share a grouping key. Each InvoiceProcessedDetailEventplatform event for an action is grouped within the parent InvoiceProcessedDetailEvent platform event.

EventUuid.description: A universally unique identifier (UUID) that identifies a platform event message.

InvoiceErrorDetailEvents.description: A list of errors that occurred while attempting to create the invoice.

InvoiceId.description: The ID of the new invoice.

InvoiceStatus.description: The value of the Status field on the invoice.

IsSuccess.description: Required. Indicates whether the invoice creation attempt was successful (true) or not (false).

InvoiceProcessedDetailEvent.accessRules: This object is available when Billing is enabled.
